qas.question: Per Nielsen, how many homes exist in the Richmond-Petersburg DMA?
Where does the Richmind-Petersburg DMA rank in the United States?
With what network is WUPV 65 affiliated?
What type of channel is WCVW 57?
What Richmond-area station is affiliated with CBS?

context: The Richmond metro area is served by many local television and radio stations. As of 2010[update], the Richmond-Petersburg designated market area (DMA) is the <a1_0>58th<a1_0/> largest in the U.S. with <a0_0>553,950<a0_0/> homes according to Nielsen Market Research. The major network television affiliates are <a4_0>WTVR-TV 6<a4_0/> (CBS), WRIC-TV 8 (ABC), WWBT 12 (NBC), WRLH-TV 35 (Fox), and WUPV 65 (<a2_0>CW<a2_0/>). <a3_0>Public Broadcasting<a3_0/> Service stations include WCVE-TV 23 and WCVW 57. There are also a wide variety of radio stations in the Richmond area, catering to many different interests, including news, talk radio, and sports, as well as an eclectic mix of musical interests.
